nodes.text: Ben Solo and the Bug Hunters – Chapter 1
"Ben Solo and the Bug Hunters – Chapter 1" is the fourteenth episode of the animated shorts series Star Wars Roll Out. It was first released March 18, 2020 on YouTube.

Sweet but chaotic Ben Solo keeps bungling the plans of his dad Han and his Uncle Chewbacca. When he secretly tags along on their mission to capture some crystal butterflies, a gang of rival Bug Hunters make Ben look like the least of their problems!.

The episode opens with Han Solo, Chewbacca, and Ben Solo rolling through a park. Chewbacca climbs up a tree with yellow leaves and shakes it, causing green fruits to drop down. Emulating the adults, Ben shakes a purple leaf tree but instead disturbs several centipedes.

Later, Han and Chewbacca cart several green crystals out of the cave. Trying to help, Ben throws a thermal detonator into the cave, which causes an explosion that leaves them bruised and burned. Ben laughs. Later, Han and Chewbacca are testing the crystals with a machine but Ben disturbs them.

Later that night, Han and Chewbacca make plans to travel to a planet to find more crystals. Shortly later, Leia Organa enters the room only to find Ben scribbling with crayon, much to the annoyance of everyone.

The following morning, Han leaves while Leia is sleeping to embark on their hunt for crystal butterflies. However, Ben follows them down the turbolift. He then crawls through a tunnel to reach the Millennium Falcon and stows aboard the ship. Han and Chewbacca depart Chandrila aboard the Falcon and travel through hyperspace.

While Han and Chewbacca are resting, they are woken up by the ship jerking. Han and Chewbacca find Ben in the cockpit. After tying him and leaving him aboard the ship with toys, the two embark on their crystal hunt. They climb a mountain and find some honey. However, the two are caught inside a net.
